amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress relating to the Comprehensive Everglades Restoration Plan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3066 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3066 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4336) To express the sense of Congress relating to the Comprehensive Everglades Restoration Plan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3066 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3066 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 2910.
